knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

```{r cars}
library(plotly)
data("mathews_screening_data")
data <- ReshapeData(mathews_screening_data)
scores <- CalculateSynergy(data)
s <- .ExtendedScores(scores$scores[[1]], 3)
df <- reshape2::melt(s)
```
```{r}
ax <- list(
  title = "",
  zeroline = FALSE,
  showline = FALSE,
  showticklabels = FALSE,
  showgrid = FALSE
)
scene = list(
  xaxis = ax,
  yaxis = ax,
  zaxis = ax,
  showlegend = FALSE,
  camera = list(eye = list(x = -1.25, y = 1.25, z = 1.25)))
fig <- plot_ly(z = ~s, showscale = FALSE) %>% 
  layout(scene = scene) %>% 
  add_contour
fig
```

```{r}
fig <- plot_ly(df, x = ~Var1, y = ~Var2, z = ~value, mode="lines")
fig
```
